scripts.build: mkdir -p out; cp node_modules/spec-md/css/* out; spec-md GraphQL.md > out/index.html
scripts.deploy: npm run build && (cd out && git init && git config user.name "Travis CI" && git config user.email "github@fb.com" && git add . && git commit -m "Deploy to GitHub Pages" && git push --force --quiet "https://${GH_TOKEN}@github.com/facebook/graphql.git" master:gh-pages > /dev/null 2>1)
